messages.message:
I'm seeing a bunch of errors whenever I try to do edits with a deployment on UAT - it's blocking testing of upstream integrations for me.
Who can take a look at this? I tested integrations, adding a notification, changing human review settings, they're all failing
I can take a look. Is this related to prod deployments?
No it should just be a normal deployment. I didn't do anything special for this

I'll assign it to you for now. You can ignore all the httpapi requests btw, that's just for Amplitude and I have an adblocker :sweat_smile:
It's the endpoints that actually do an edit on deployments that is causing the errors
Have done some precursory investigation. Seems this is not occurring in sandbox.
Great catch! We just needed to backport the fix (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/73367) @tony.shi made
